description: A family favorite that deliciously combines American ingredients and Korean cuisine.
ingredient: [{"name": "gochujang", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "soy sauce", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "mirin", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "gochugaru", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "fish sauce", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "ramen spice packets", "units": null, "amount": 2}, {"name": "garlic", "units": "cloves", "amount": 4}, {"name": "rice cakes", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "green onions", "units": null, "amount": 2}, {"name": "kimchi", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "napa cabbage", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "enoki mushrooms", "units": "ounces", "amount": 8}, {"name": "Vienna sausages", "units": "can", "amount": 1}, {"name": "Spam", "units": "can", "amount": 1}, {"name": "firm tofu", "units": "ounces", "amount": 12}, {"name": "canned pork and beans", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "chicken broth", "units": "cups", "amount": 6}, {"name": "instant ramen", "units": "package", "amount": 2}, {"name": "american cheese", "units": "to 2 slices", "amount": 1}, {"name": "steamed rice", "units": "cups", "amount": 3}]
step_by_step: 1. Combine all sauce ingredients in a small bowl and mix. Set aside. 2. Soak rice cakes in cold water for at least 15 minutes. 3. Prepare soup ingredients: slice green onions, chop kimchi, slice napa cabbage, separate enoki mushrooms, slice Vienna sausages, and cut Spam and tofu. 4. In a large pot, arrange rice cakes, kimchi, cabbage, mushrooms, sausages, Spam, tofu, and beans around the edge, leaving the middle empty. Spoon sauce into the middle. 5. Pour chicken broth around the edges and bring to a boil. 6. Once boiling, blend broth and sauce together. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes. 7. Add ramen noodles to the center and cook until soft, about 3-4 minutes. 8. Add cheese slices on top and cover until melted. Garnish with green onion and serve over hot rice.
nutrition_info: 548 calories, 26g fat, 56g carbs, 25g protein per serving.
notes: There are no hard and fast rules for ingredients; feel free to substitute based on availability.
